objectives: Students will discuss health and fitness using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Action/Adventure themed scenarios related to health and fitness
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining health and fitness content with Action/Adventure narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore health and fitness through a Action/Adventure lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a high-stakes action sequence involving health and fitness

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to health and fitness in a action context
Students engage in action themed role-play about health and fitness using expert register
Students create original action themed content about health and fitness in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe health and fitness in a Action/Adventure scenario?
What chase or pursuit might be involved in health and fitness?
Can you create a Action/Adventure story about health and fitness?
How does health and fitness change when viewed through a Action/Adventure perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this action scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Action/Adventure situation involving health and fitness
roles: Character A: Using expert register in action context
Character B: Responding in expert register within action theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Action/Adventure theme: High energy, excitement, physical challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Action/Adventure themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
